title: Components
subtitle: Manage system components for your distributions

delete.title: Confirm Deletion
delete.confirmSingle: Are you sure you want to delete "{{ name }}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirmMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} components? This action cannot be undone.
delete.warning: Deleting components may affect distributions and sources that reference them.

empty.title: No components found
empty.description: No components match the current filter, or no components have been created yet.

name.label: Slug Name
name.help: Unique slug using lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.
name.invalid: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed

category.label: Category
category.help: The functional category this component belongs to.

artifactPattern.label: Artifact Pattern
artifactPattern.help: Pattern for the downloaded artifact filename. Use {version} placeholder.

defaultUrlTemplate.label: Default URL Template
defaultUrlTemplate.help: Default URL template for downloading this component.

isOptional.label: Optional Component
isOptional.help: Optional components are not required for a minimal distribution.

versionRule.label: Version Selection Rule
versionRule.help: How the default version is determined for this component.

defaultVersion.label: Pinned Version
defaultVersion.help: The specific version to use when rule is set to 'Pinned'.
defaultVersion.required: Version is required when using pinned version rule

isKernelModule.label: Kernel Module
isKernelModule.help: Enable if this component requires kernel configuration at build time (e.g., filesystem drivers, security modules)

isUserspace.label: Userspace Tool
isUserspace.help: Enable if this component needs to be built as a userspace binary (e.g., CLI tools, daemons)

detail.title: Component Details
detail.subtitle: View and manage component configuration
detail.noTemplates: No URL templates configured for this component.
detail.noSources: No sources are currently configured for this component.
detail.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete "{{ name }}"? This action cannot be undone.
detail.deleteSourcesWarning: This component has {{ count }} related source(s) that will lose their component association.
